Class TldGenerateMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
io.github.weblegacy.maven.plugin.taglib.TldGenerateMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextEnabled, Mojo
@Mojo(name="tldgenerate", defaultPhase=GENERATE_RESOURCES) public class TldGenerateMojo extends AbstractMojo
Generates tld files from directories of jsp 2.0 tag files.
Author:
Fabrizio Giustina
